p: The lungs of mice were excised and fixed in 10% ( v/ v) formalin and embedded in parafilm wax. Fixed tissues were sectioned (50 Âµm thick) and stained with hematoxylin and eosin (H and E). Parameters used in scoring the total lung inflammation were bronchiolitis, edema, and interstitial inflammation. The severity of each parameter was scored in a blinded manner on a scale of 0 to 4, in which 0 indicates absent, and 1 to 4 indicate increasing severity. The sum of the score of each parameter is the total lung inflammation score and the maximum score is 12 [ 30].
